name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Teamstand - Store, File, & Find Docs in Gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One tool - and one place - to access the files that you share in Gmail™ and Slack. We automate the time-consuming process of organizing your digital assets. When you need that document for a client project, a team meeting, or managing your business's finances, just look to the right - it's right there.

GOOGLE FRIENDLY 
Our service meets you where you work with an extension embedded in Gmail that organizes your attachments and files shared in Google Drive™.

ORGANIZED AND SECURE
AI sorts digital assets from your emails and chats into automated folders for you to easily search, while giving you control over who has access with our robust encryption and permissions tools.

TIME-SAVING SHORTCUTS
Shave minutes off of each follow-up task and action item for your projects and customers by saving frequently used templates and sharing them from your browser window.

TAGGING & CUSTOMIZING 
Add your own tags to documents, add people and companies to your favorites, and invite your team to collaborate out of the automatic, shared folders.

REDUCE DOUBLE-WORK 
Sort and view the history of different versions to help get your team and customers on the same page.

BUILT FOR
Customer Success Teams
Sales Teams
Finance and Operations Teams
Marketing Teams
Entrepreneurs
Any busy professionals who want to streamline their work.

If you have any problems or feedback regarding the Teamstand extension, reach out to us at support@teamstand.com.
